resources.string: Q1. What percentage of total waste generated in the EU is represented by municipal waste?

Thank you for your interest in this topic!
Mount Rumpke, in the United States, is over 300 metres high and created entirely from rubbish
Making one tin from raw materials uses less amount of energy that it takes to recycle 1 tin
Glass can be recycled an unlimited number of times
